Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans are 7-31, which puts them in last place in the Western Conference. The Philadelphia 76ers are 15-20, which puts them in 11th place in the Eastern Conference.

The Pelicans have lost three of their last five games, and are coming off a loss to the Minnesota Timberwolves. The Sixers have also lost three of their last five games, and are coming off a loss to the Phoenix Suns.
